champ_0125_rival_01:
Hey, I heard the good news! Congrats on Gym
Badge number six![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0125_rival_02:
Not even a tenth of the Trainers who take on
the Gyms get this far, y’know![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0125_rival_03:
But I’m not surprised that you made it. I just
KNEW there was a reason you caught my eye![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0125_rival_05: Oh please! I should be the one thanking you![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0125_rival_06:
Well, trust me—I could tell from our very first
battle you were gonna grow seriously strong![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0125_rival_07:
Aaanyway...I bet you could use a little warming
up before you take on the Gym, huh?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0125_rival_08: C’mon! You know the drill by now![VAR 0114(0004)]
